greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1; if n > a(n-1) then a(n) = n*a(n-1) else a(n) = least integer multiple of a(n-1)/n.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(16) = 165, 17 < 165, so a(17) = (least integer multiple of 165/17) = 165.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 29 2004
